prompts: Create a playful feline Pokemon with a gold charm on its forehead.
Imagine a small, agile Pokemon that loves to collect shiny objects.
Design a charming, whiskered creature that thrives in urban environments.
Make a Pokemon with a mischievous grin and a luxurious tail.
Show me a cat-like Pokemon with cream and orange colors and an adorable personality.
Generate a Pokemon that embodies cleverness and agility, perfect for stealth.
Give me a Pokemon that enjoys exploring cities and gathering treasures.
